divs: Sighting Details1. My husband works midnights and I was walking with him out the door to say goodbye. 2. It was a fairly large object that was directly in my line of view. 3. I had no idea and my husband didn't either, we have never seen anything like it! 4. It looked like an orange fireball, it had a floating appearance but there was not even a breeze, It seemed to be moving pretty quick and it was following a distinct south to north straight line path. 5. Very shocked and in awe, I am certain I frightened my husband when i started yelling "what the heck is that!" Afterwords I wish I would have grabbed my camcorder! 6. My husband and I both watched as it flew over my neighbors house and half way across the field, in mid flight and in the middle of the field it just disappeared!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Marissa
This sighting has never been favorited.
